home-highlight-algorithm-text: Or go directly to one of these algorithms
noResults: No algorithm was found for this search request.

footer.text: Note: this website is under development. Information will change often. Do you want to help?

homepageTitle: Algorithm register of the Dutch government
searchExplanation: Find algorithms by organisation, title or description

homePageText.paragraph1: Op deze website publiceren overheidsorganisatie de algoritmes die zij gebruiken in hun werk.
homePageText.paragraph2: Effort is made to publish all algorithms that are public. This to ensure the purpose of algorithms and to make sure people involved can examine the algorithms.
homePageText.paragraph3part1: At this moment you will findÂ

dashboard.countPerTypeTitle: Algorithms in the register per type
dashboard.fullyComplete: All mandatory and optional fields filled

name.label: Name
name.description: The name used to refer to the algorithm.

organization.label: Organisation
organization.description: The full name of the organisation responsible for the algorithm use.

department.label: Department
department.description: The full name of the sub-organisation or division responsible for the algorithm use.

description_short.label: Short description
description_short.description: A brief, high-level description of the algorithm (max. 150 characters).

type.label: Algorithm type
type.description: Is the algorithm rule-based or based on machine learning? Rule-based algorithms are manually constructed by humans, usually based off of laws or regulations. Machine learning algorithms will find their own correlations based on the data given.

category.label: Domain
category.description: Keywords related to the domain in which the algorithm is deployed.

website.label: Link to publication website
website.description: The URL of the publication website of the organisation. On this page, you may find more information regarding the deployment of the algorithm at the organisation.

status.label: Status
status.description: The current implementation state of the algorithm: in development, in use, or out of service.

goal.label: Purpose
goal.description: The purpose for which the algorithm was developed and/or how the algorithm's deployment directly adds to this purpose.

impact.label: Impact
impact.description: The impact of the algorithm on civilians and companies. For example: how does this algorithm work and what are its expected consequences for civilians and companies?

proportionality.label: Proportionality
proportionality.description: A consideration of pros and cons regarding the deployment of the algorithm and why this is reasonably justified.

decision_making_process.label: Decision making process
decision_making_process.description: The name of the organisational process(es) within the organisation in which the algorithm is deployed.

documentation.label: Link to project website
documentation.description: The URL of the project website of the organisation. On this page, you may find more information regarding the project where the algorithm is deployed.

description.label: Long description
description.description: An extensive description of the algorithm (500-10000 characters).

application_url.label: Link to developer
application_url.description: The URL of the application website of the developer. On this page, you may find more general information regarding the algorithm and its developer.

publiccode.label: Link to code base
publiccode.description: The URL of the code base of the developer. On this page, you may find more specific information regarding the algorithm's code itself.

mprd.label: Usage of base registries
mprd.description: Does the algorithm directly use any data of the national base registries? More information is available at https://www.nldigitalgovernment.nl/

source_data.label: Data sources
source_data.description: An overview of data sources that are currently being used by the algorithm and/or were initially being used to create the algorithm.

methods_and_models.label: Methods and models
methods_and_models.description: Standard methodology or models that are being used by the algorithm.

monitoring.label: Monitoring
monitoring.description: An overview of how the deployment of the algorithm is being monitored.

human_intervention.label: Human intervention
human_intervention.description: A description of how the output of the alghorithm is reviewed and may be edited by humans.

risks.label: Risks
risks.description: An overview of the expected risks related to the deployment of this algorithm.

performance_standard.label: Evaluation metrics
performance_standard.description: A description of the expected scoring of the algorithm, including its metrics.

competent_authority.label: Authorized body
competent_authority.description: The full name of the authorized body responsible for the deployment of the algorithm.

lawful_basis.label: Formal grounds
lawful_basis.description: A description of or link to the formal grounds that form the base of the deployment of this algorithm. For example: a law, a regulation or a formal decision.

iama.label: Human Rights Impact Assessment (IAMA)
iama.description: Has the algorithm been verified through a human rights impact assessment (IAMA)?

iama_description.label: IAMA Description
iama_description.description: An executive summary of the IAMA results, if any.

dpia.label: Data Protection Impact Assessment (DPIA)
dpia.description: Has the algorithm been verified through a data protection impact assessment (DPIA)?

dpia_description.label: DPIA Description
dpia_description.description: An executive summary of the DPIA results, if any.

objection_procedure.label: Objection procedure
objection_procedure.description: A description of how civilians and companies may object against an outcome of the algorithm.

schema_metadata.label: Scheme
schema_metadata.description: The registration scheme; in machine readable format.

schema.label: Scheme
schema.description: The registration scheme; in machine readable format.

uuid.label: UUID
uuid.description: The unique user identification (UUID) of this registration.

url.label: Link to source registration
url.description: The URL of the secondary register in which this algorithm was previously documented; in machine readable format

contact_email.label: Contact email
contact_email.description: The contact email for this registration.

area.label: Geographic area
area.description: The geopgrahical location in which the algorithm is deployed.

lang.label: Language
lang.description: The language in which this registration is documented.

revision_date.label: Revision date
revision_date.description: The revision date of this registration.
